tool.name: Rename sequences
tool.description: Rename sequences using numerical counter, keep required prefix and pair information

param.name: prefix_length
param.label: Prefix length
param.help: Enter the length of prefix to keep in sequences names

param.name: paired
param.label: Sequences are paired-end reads in interlaced format

tool.help:
**What is does**
Use this tool to rename your sequences with numerical counter while keeping sequence name prefex as part of the name. If paired-end reads are used, the last character in sequence name is used to distinguish pairs.
